inclusion.criterion: Patients with RA according to ARA 1987 revised criteria and disease activity DAS 3-5
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ARA 1987 revised criteria and disease activity DAS 3-5

exclusion.criterion: Cervical spondylosis with nerve root compression, Cervical symptomatic disc syndromes
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. Scoliotic curve is measured as 45 degree.
